rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BIO3011, STA2216}
Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BIO3011, STA2216}

description: Students will undertake a supervised research project. Students will carry out a research project and present the results of their study in both written and oral form. Information about research projects will be available from the course coordinator towards the end of the preceding semester.
